statements: SELECT * FROM refugee_camps;
SELECT camp_name, country_name, aid_organization FROM refugee_camps;
SELECT camp_id, camp_name, aid_amount FROM refugee_camps WHERE country_name = 'Syria';
SELECT camp_id, camp_name, aid_amount FROM refugee_camps WHERE aid_amount > 100000;
SELECT camp_name, country_name, aid_amount FROM refugee_camps ORDER BY aid_amount DESC;
SELECT camp_name, country_name, aid_amount FROM refugee_camps WHERE aid_amount > 10000 ORDER BY aid_amount DESC;
SELECT camp_name, aid_organization FROM refugee_camps WHERE country_name = 'Syria';
SELECT camp_id, camp_name, aid_amount FROM refugee_camps WHERE aid_organization = 'Red Cross' ORDER BY camp_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM refugee_camps WHERE country_name IN ('Lebanon', 'Jordan') ORDER BY country_name, aid_amount DESC;
SELECT camp_name, country_name, aid_organization FROM refugee_camps WHERE aid_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 15000;
SELECT * FROM aid_resources;
SELECT aid_id, camp_name, distribution_date FROM aid_resources WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT camp_name, location FROM refugee_camps WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT aid_type, quantity FROM aid_resources WHERE distribution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT camp_name, capacity FROM refugee_camps ORDER BY capacity ASC, camp_name DESC;
SELECT aid_id, camp_name, distribution_date FROM aid_resources WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT camp_name, location, capacity FROM refugee_camps WHERE capacity < 5000 ORDER BY location;
SELECT * FROM aid_resources INNER JOIN refugee_camps ON aid_resources.camp_name = refugee_camps.camp_name WHERE aid_type = 'Food' AND location = 'Syria';
SELECT aid_id, aid_type, camp_name, location FROM aid_resources, refugee_camps WHERE aid_resources.aid_id = 1 AND refugee_camps.camp_id = 2;
SELECT camp_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM aid_resources GROUP BY camp_name HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT * FROM AidResources;
SELECT aid_name, quantity FROM AidResources WHERE aid_id = 1;
SELECT camp_name, location FROM RefugeeCamps ORDER BY camp_id DESC;
SELECT aid_name, quantity, distribution_date FROM AidResources WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT camp_name, location, capacity FROM RefugeeCamps WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT aid_name, quantity, distribution_date FROM AidResources WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT distribution_id, quantity_sent, distribution_date, aid_name FROM AidDistribution INNER JOIN AidResources ON AidDistribution.aid_id = AidResources.aid_id
SELECT camp_name, location, capacity FROM RefugeeCamps WHERE capacity >= 500

SELECT aid_name, quantity, distribution_date, camp_name, location FROM AidResources INNER JOIN AidDistribution ON AidResources.aid_id = AidDistribution.aid_id INNER JOIN RefugeeCamps ON AidDistribution.camp_id = RefugeeCamps.camp_id

SELECT aid_name, distribution_date, location, contact_person FROM AidResources INNER JOIN AidDistribution ON AidResources.aid_id = AidDistribution.aid_id INNER JOIN RefugeeCamps ON AidDistribution.camp_id = RefugeeCamps.camp_id WHERE distribution_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM aid_resources;
SELECT aid_type, aid_amount FROM aid_resources WHERE aid_amount > 500;
SELECT camp_name, location, capacity FROM refugee_camps ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT a.aid_id, a.aid_type, a.aid_amount, c.camp_name FROM aid_resources a JOIN refugee_camps c ON a.camp_id = c.camp_id;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, delivery_quantity FROM aid_delivery WHERE delivery_quantity < 1000 ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM aid_resources LIMIT 10;
SELECT aid_id, aid_type, aid_amount FROM aid_resources WHERE aid_type = 'Food';
SELECT camp_id, camp_name, location FROM refugee_camps ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT delivery_date, delivery_quantity FROM aid_delivery WHERE delivery_quantity > 1000;
SELECT person_name, role, phone_number FROM delivery_personnel WHERE camp_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM aid_agencies;
SELECT agency_id, agency_name FROM aid_agencies ORDER BY agency_id DESC;
SELECT agency_name, agency_location FROM aid_agencies WHERE agency_location = 'Africa';
SELECT * FROM refugee_camps ORDER BY camp_name ASC;
SELECT camp_name, camp_location FROM refugee_camps WHERE camp_location <> 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM aid_agencies ORDER BY agency_id DESC;
SELECT agency_name, agency_location FROM aid_agencies WHERE agency_location = 'Africa';
SELECT camp_name, camp_location FROM refugee_camps WHERE camp_location = 'Middle East' AND camp_name LIKE 'Camp%';
SELECT ai.item_name, si.quantity FROM aid_items ai JOIN shipment_items si ON ai.item_id = si.item_id WHERE si.quantity > 100;

SELECT aa.agency_name, rc.camp_name, as.shipment_date FROM aid_agencies aa JOIN aid_shipments as ON aa.agency_id = as.agency_id JOIN refugee_camps rc ON as.camp_id = rc.camp_id ORDER BY as.shipment_date DESC;
